special_powers.name: HIDDEN IDENTITY REVEALED
special_powers.description: When Clayface would be KO'd, roll a d6 and add the number of Identity tokens. On a result of 6+, instead of KO'ing Clayface, replace him with [BTAS] #056 Clayface on click #6. Protected: Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: CORPORATE ESPIONAGE
special_powers.description: Clayface does not count for or against a theme team.

special_powers.name: HIDDEN IDENTITY
special_powers.description: Shape Change, but succeeds on [4-6]. When Clayface uses it and succeeds, you may give him an Identity token. Protected: Outwit.

special_powers.name: DOES THIS SMELL FUNNY TO YOU, BATS?
special_powers.description: Smoke Cloud. FREE: Make a close attack targeting an opposing character occupying a square with his Smoke Cloud marker regardless of adjacency. Instead of normal damage, give a hit character an action token.

special_powers.name: PRETTY POISON
special_powers.description: Poison. Poison Ivy has PROTECTED: Poison.

special_powers.name: I'LL ROUND UP SOME GUYS
special_powers.description: Suited Henchman does not count for or against a theme team. When Suited Henchman starts the game, roll a d6 to determine his starting click: [1] = Click #1; [2] = Click #3; [3] = Click #5; [4] = Click #7; [5] = Click #9; [6] = Click #11

special_powers.name: I'LL ACCOMPANY YOU ANYWHERE, MASTER BRUCE
special_powers.description: Sidestep. When an adjacent friendly character named Batman is given a MOVE action, after resolutions you may place Alfred adjacent to that Batman.

special_powers.name: WHEN ALFRED'S BANDAGES WON'T DO
special_powers.description: Support. When Leslie Thompkins uses it to target a character with the Batman Family keyword, you may roll a D6. If the result of that roll is less than the target's current click number, increase the result of Support's roll to heal +1.

special_powers.name: TWO SIDES TO THE COIN
special_powers.description: When Two-Face hits with an attack, modify damage +1 for each [2] in the attack roll. His attack roll of [2,2] has all targets become hit.

special_powers.name: GOTHAM CRIME BOSS
special_powers.description: Leadership, Mastermind. When Two-Face uses Leadership and succeeds, instead of removing an action token, you may generate a [BTAS] #005 Suited Henchman. (When placing the Suited Henchman, roll for its trait to determine its starting click.)

special_powers.name: TOO COLD, HERO?
special_powers.description: Outwit, but only to target characters with action tokens, and if the target has 2 action tokens, you may choose an additional power.

special_powers.name: THE NINJA STYLE COMES IN MANY FORMS
special_powers.description: Stealth. At the beginning of your turn, for all characters with this trait, choose a standard power Ninja has printed on this card. This turn, all friendly [BTAS] #010 Ninja and Ninja Bystanders can use that power.

special_powers.name: NON-LETHAL FORCE
special_powers.description: Incapacitate. When Commissioner Gordon uses it, after resolutions roll a d6. 4-6: Give the target an action token.

special_powers.name: PLAYING BOTH SIDES
special_powers.description: Once per force, when Catwoman is KO'd, do not remove her from the game. Instead, after resolutions, place her in the square she last occupied on her starting click. She is now friendly to your opponent's force. (This character is scored by the current opponent each time it's KO'd.)

special_powers.name: A WHOLE BUNCHA CRAZY IN A PRETTY LIL' PACKAGE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may roll a d6. If you do, turn Harley Quinn's dial to that click number. (She does not return to her initial click.)

special_powers.name: AFTER YOU, DEE DEE
special_powers.description: Sidestep. Passenger: 1, but only to carry characters named Dee Dee. Modify attack +1 if adjacent to another friendly character named Dee Dee.

special_powers.name: THANKS, DEE DEE!
special_powers.description: Empower. Shape Change, but only if adjacent to a friendly character named Dee Dee.

special_powers.name: THE VOICE OF EXPERIENCE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may choose one Blades/Claws/Fangs, Energy Explosion, Incapacitate, Steal Energy. Batman Beyond can use the chosen power until your next turn.

special_powers.name: GUESS AGAIN, BATMAN!
special_powers.description: When The Riddler is attacked, you may guess if the attack roll will be odd or even. If your guess is correct for the finalized attack roll and the attack would hit, he evades the attack instead.

special_powers.name: YOUR TIME IS COMING TO AN END, MR. MAYOR
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, choose one: generate a Time Bomb marker [MAX 3] within 6 squares -or- remove a Time Bomb marker and give each opposing character within 2 squares of it an action token.

special_powers.name: JUST LIKE CLOCKWORK
special_powers.description: Sidestep. When Clock King uses it, he can use Improved Movement: Characters.

special_powers.name: THIS IS A CRIME SCENE, I'LL NEED STATEMENTS
special_powers.description: Sidestep. Opposing characters within 3 squares and line of fire must roll for breaking away when moving as if they were adjacent to Renee Montoya. (They can still automatically break away.)

special_powers.name: CAN I BE OF SERVICE, MASTER BRUCE?
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - If Alfred is adjacent to a character named Batman, modify both of their defense +1.

special_powers.name: I ALWAYS BELIEVED IN YOU, BRUCE
special_powers.description: Perplex. UNIQUE MODIFIER - When Alfred uses it to target a friendly character with the Batman Family keyword, (after choosing the combat value) you may roll a d6. If the result is less than the target's click number, you may instead modify the chosen combat value +2.

special_powers.name: I KNOW ALL OF THE OLD TRICKS, KID
special_powers.description: Incapacitate. POWER: Friendly characters with the Police keyword within range can use Improved Targeting: Hindering this turn.

special_powers.name: FOLLOWING IN JIM'S FOOTSTEPS
special_powers.description: Leadership, Enhancement.

special_powers.name: I'M NOT INTERESTED IN THE SMALL FISH
special_powers.description: Opposing characters of 10 points or less within 6 squares can't be chosen for Mastermind.

special_powers.name: YOU HAVE REAPED AN ICY WIND
special_powers.description: Barrier, Force Blast. If Mr. Freeze knocked a character back and that character's knock back path was stopped by blocking terrain, he can use "Barrier as FREE" this turn, but only to generate Barrier Markers adjacent to that character.

special_powers.name: COLD COMFORT
special_powers.description: Incapacitate. When Mr. Freeze uses it and hits, also deal his damage value among hit target(s).

special_powers.name: A WORTHY OPPONENT
special_powers.description: Stealth. When Kyodai Ken attacks a character of equal or more points, modify attack +1

special_powers.name: SLEEP GAS GUN
special_powers.description: FREE: Once per game, give each adjacent opposing character an action token.

special_powers.name: CRIMINALS WILL NEVER ESCAPE ON MY WATCH
special_powers.description: Plasticity.

special_powers.name: LOCK THIS PLACE DOWN!
special_powers.description: Barrier. Opposing characters adjacent to 2 or more of Lock-Up's Barrier markers modify speed -2.

special_powers.name: LOOK ON MY WORKS, YE MIGHTY, AND DESPAIR!
special_powers.description: POWER: Generate a Stone Harpy bystander [Max 2]. // FREE: Generate a Stone Harpy bystander [Max 2], but only in an adjacent square that's on the rim of elevated terrain.

special_powers.name: FROZEN WITH FEAR
special_powers.description: Stealth. FREE: Choose a character occupying one of his Smoke Cloud Markers that can't use Willpower. That character gains Immobile until your next turn.

special_powers.name: SO MANY WONDERFUL VARIETIES OF MY GAS...
special_powers.description: Smoke Cloud. Smoke Cloud as FREE, but only to generate 2 markers. (You may activate both in a single turn.)

special_powers.name: PLUNGED INTO NIGHTMARES
special_powers.description: Exploit Weakness. FREE: Choose a character occupying one of his markers that can't use Willpower. That character gains Battle Fury until your next turn.

special_powers.name: GOTHAM CRIME BOSS
special_powers.description: Leadership, Mastermind. When the Penguin uses Leadership and succeeds, instead of removing an action token, you may generate a BTAS #005 Suited Henchman. (When placing the Suited Henchman, roll for its trait to determine its starting click.)

special_powers.name: PICKING OUT MY TARGETS
special_powers.description: FREE: Turn Batman to the same click number of a different color.

special_powers.name: I AM THE NIGHT
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - When Batman damages an opposing character, opposing characters modify attack -1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: SMOKE GRENADES TO COVER MY APPROACH
special_powers.description: Smoke Cloud as FREE. // When Batman is given a MOVE action while in hindering terrain, after resolutions he may make a close attack.

special_powers.name: DYNAMIC DUO
special_powers.description: Empower, but only when adjacent to a character named Batman.

special_powers.name: YOU GOTTA PAY FOR THAT SMILE
special_powers.description: Leadership. Perplex, but only to modify an attack value on a friendly character.

special_powers.name: YOU OWE MOTHER NATURE A BIG DEBT... AND I'M GOING TO SEE THAT YOU PAY IT
special_powers.description: Smoke Cloud. When removing her Smoke Cloud markers from the map, you may generate a Pheremone Mushroom bystander [MAX 3] in one unoccupied square that had a Smoke Cloud marker. // FREE: Remove a Pheremone Mushroom bystander from the map.

special_powers.name: GOTHAM CRIME BOSS
special_powers.description: Leadership, Mastermind. When Roland Daggett uses Leadership and succeeds, instead of removing an action token, you may generate #005 Suited Henchman. (when placing Suited Henchman, roll for its trait to determine its starting click).

special_powers.name: CEO AND SHAREHOLDER OF DAGGETT CHEMICALS
special_powers.description: POWER: Choose an adjacent friendly character. That character can use Shape Change until your next turn.

special_powers.name: TRAPPED BETWEEN MY FATHER AND MY BELOVED
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose a friendly character of higher points. When that character is KO'd, after resolutions turn Talia Al Ghul to click #5.

special_powers.name: LEAGUE OF SHADOWS
special_powers.description: Sidestep, Stealth.

special_powers.name: THE SHADOWS OF ONE'S HEART
special_powers.description: Improved Targeting: Ignores Hindering Terrain. Penetrating/Psychic Blast, but only to target a character occupying hindering terrain.

special_powers.name: LOYAL UBU, ALWAYS BY MY SIDE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, generate a Ubu bystander.

special_powers.name: LEAGUE OF SHADOWS
special_powers.description: Sidestep, Stealth.

special_powers.name: A VAST GLOBAL ORGANIZATION
special_powers.description: Leadership, Mastermind. When Ra's al Ghul uses Leadership and succeeds, instead of removing an action token, you may generate a Ninja bystander [MAX 3].
Modify Ubu's combat values +1 if he's adjacent to a friendly character named Ra's al Ghul.

special_powers.name: JUSTICE LEAGUE UNLIMITED
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6. [6]: Remove an action token from another friendly character with the Justice League keyword that's 100 points or less.

special_powers.name: LASSO SNARE
special_powers.description: POWER: Choose an opposing character of the same size or smaller within 5 squares and line of fire, and roll a d6. If the result is higher than the number of squares to that character, you may place that character adjacent to Wonder Woman. On any result, you may then make a close attack.

special_powers.name: JUSTICE LEAGUE UNLIMITED
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6. [6]: Remove an action token from another friendly character with the Justice League keyword that's 100 points or less.

special_powers.name: I'LL BE THERE IF YOU NEED ME
special_powers.description: Charge. Once per game, Superman can use Hypersonic Speed.

special_powers.name: TAKING THE HITS MY TEAMMATES CAN'T
special_powers.description: Leadership. Adjacent friendly characters can use Mastermind, but only to choose Superman.

special_powers.name: FORMER BOY WONDER
special_powers.description: Leap/Climb, Sidestep. FREE: If Nightwing has two action tokens, make an attack.

special_powers.name: JUSTICE LEAGUE UNLIMITED
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, roll a D6. 6: Remove an action token from another friendly character with the Justice League keyword that's 100 points or less.

special_powers.name: MACHINE GUN PUNCHES
special_powers.description: Sidestep. Flurry.

special_powers.name: YOO-HOO, OVER HERE!
special_powers.description: Probability Control. When The Flash uses it, if he is being targeted in the attack and the attack misses him, after resolutions, you may place him within 3 squares and line of fire of the attacker.

special_powers.name: JUSTICE LEAGUE UNLIMITED
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6. [6]: Remove an action token from another friendly character with the Justice League keyword that's 100 points or less.

special_powers.name: GREEN LANTERN POWER RING
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose one: [Improved Targeting: Destroys Blocking], Close Combat Expert, Ranged Combat Expert, Giant Reach: 3, -or- Barrier. Green Lantern can use the chosen power or ability until your next turn.

special_powers.name: INFILTRATION
special_powers.description: If you did not choose the map, when placing characters during game setup, you may place Batman in a square of hindering terrain within 5 squares of his starting area.

special_powers.name: BATARANG
special_powers.description: Batman may start the game with the [BtAS] #s001 Batarang equipped. // Batman may activate an equipped [BtAS] #s001 Batarang as FREE instead of RANGE and doesn't roll to KO it.

special_powers.name: YOU'D BETTER HOPE YOUR MEN ARE WORTH THE MONEY YOU'RE SPENDING
special_powers.description: Combat Reflexes, Toughness. Adjacent opposing characters can't use Mastermind.

special_powers.name: INFILTRATION
special_powers.description: If you did not choose the map, when placing characters during game setup, you may place Robin in a square of hindering terrain within 5 squares of his starting area.

special_powers.name: THIS IS STARTING TO GET JUST... SAD, REALLY
special_powers.description: Combat Reflexes, Super Senses. Willpower, but only if there is a character named Batman or Bruce Wayne within 6 squares.

special_powers.name: GOTHAM CRIME BOSS
special_powers.description: Leadership, Mastermind. When The Joker uses Leadership and succeeds, instead of removing an action token, you may generate a [BTAS] #005 Suited Henchman. (When placing the Suited Henchman, roll for its trait to determine its starting click.)

special_powers.name: DO YOU LIKE MY LITTLE BEAUTIES? THEY SEEM TO LIKE YOU
special_powers.description: Smoke Cloud as FREE, but only to generate 3 markers. At the end of each opponent's turn, deal 1 damage to each opposing character occupying or adjacent to a Smoke Cloud marker generated by Poison Ivy.

special_powers.name: DON'T YOU HURT THEM!
special_powers.description: Super Senses. Poison Ivy modifies her defense +1 for each adjacent Smoke Cloud Marker generated by her.

special_powers.name: DIPLOMATIC IMMUNITY
special_powers.description: Lex Luthor takes a maximum of 1 damage as long as he's adjacent to a friendly character.

special_powers.name: WHO DO YOU THINK IS REALLY IN CHARGE HERE?
special_powers.description: Characters can't choose Lex Luthor when using Mastermind.

special_powers.name: PRESIDENT? DO YOU KNOW MUCH HOW POWER I WOULD HAVE TO GIVE UP TO BECOME PRESIDENT?
special_powers.description: Leadership, Outwit, Perplex.

special_powers.name: MIND CONTROL CIRCUITRY
special_powers.description: Mind Control. When Jervis Tetch uses Mind Control, after resolutions give a hit character a Trance token. // When Jervis Tetch uses Mind Control, you may choose a character with a Trance token to target regardless of range, line of fire or adjacency. If you do, immediately after resolutions remove all Trance tokens from opposing characters.

special_powers.name: MASTER MANIPULATOR
special_powers.description: When an opposing character within range and line of fire with a Trance token would move, you may choose the first square that character moves into.

special_powers.name: INFILTRATION UNIT ZETA
special_powers.description: Shape Change. If Zeta is adjacent to 2 or more opposing characters, modify adjacent opposing character's attack -1

special_powers.name: EXTENDABLE LIMBS
special_powers.description: Giant Reach: 3

special_powers.name: REBUILD
special_powers.description: Regeneration, Toughness.

special_powers.name: DISABLE YOUR WEAPONRY
special_powers.description: Modify attack +1 and damage -1, then make a close attack. Hit characters can't use attack powers until your next turn.

special_powers.name: TIME TO GET OUT OF HERE, DOLL
special_powers.description: When Killer Croc begins movement in water terrain, speed +3. When he uses the Carry ability, characters within three squares and line of fire may be carried if they have Tiny Symbol.

special_powers.name: FEEDING FRENZY
special_powers.description: POWER: Make 3 close attacks

special_powers.name: AN IMPOSTER IN OUR MIDST!
special_powers.description: When Batman would be KO'd, roll a d6 and add the member of Identity tokens. On a result of 6+, instead of KO'ing Batman, replace him with [BTAS] #040 Batman on click #6. Protected: Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: I THREW A ROCK AT HIM... IT WAS A BIG ROCK
special_powers.description: When Batman is given a RANGE object action using a light object, damage dealt is 3 instead of 2. // FREE: If Batman is not holding an object, generate a standard light object that Batman is holding.

special_powers.name: HIDDEN IDENTITY
special_powers.description: Shape Change, but succeeds on [4-6]. When Batman uses it and succeeds, you may give him an Identity token. Protected: Outwit.

special_powers.name: VERY GOOD THEN, MR. MCGINNIS
special_powers.description: During force construction, you may choose another character with the Batman Family keyword to become Bruce Wayne's Apprentice.

special_powers.name: I ACCEPT NOTHING SHORT OF EXCELLENCE
special_powers.description: Once per turn, when Bruce Wayne's Apprentice would miss an attack, you may reroll that attack roll. If you do and Bruce Wayne's Apprentice is named Batman Beyond, increase the result of the attack roll by +1.

special_powers.name: DON'T FORGET ABOUT THE DOG
special_powers.description: STOP. Combat Reflexes. When this click is first revealed, you may generate an Ace bystander.

special_powers.name: WELCOME TO MY WORLD
special_powers.description: Outwit. At the beginning of your turn, you may choose that Bruce Wayne can't use Outwit. If you do, Bruce Wayne's Apprentice can use Outwit until your next turn.

special_powers.name: KINDRED SPIRIT
special_powers.description: At the begining of the game, choose a friendly character to become Baby Doll's Kindred Spirit. Outwit, but only when she and her Kindred Spirit are on the same click number. Perplex, but only when she in on a different click number than her Kindred Spirit. (KO'd characters aren't on any click number.)

special_powers.name: DOLL-GUN, MR. HAPPY HEAD
special_powers.description: Energy Explosion. When Baby Doll uses it, all targeted characters can't use Super Senses.

special_powers.name: AIN'T I THE CUTEST
special_powers.description: Shape Change. When Baby Doll uses it, if she hasn't hit a character with an attack this game, she succeeds on 3-6.

special_powers.name: VENOM HARNESS
special_powers.description: Bane may start the game with the [BTAS] #s002 Venom Harness equipped.

special_powers.name: FEEL YOUR SPINE CRUMBLE IN MY HANDS
special_powers.description: When Bane hits one or more characters with a close attack, hit characters modify their attack and damage values -1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: OBSERVE HOW MY OPPONENT THINKS AND FIGHTS
special_powers.description: Outwit, but only to target a character with one or more action tokens. Bane as PROTECTED: Outwit, but only against characters with one or more action tokens

special_powers.name: YOUR ANGEL OF DEATH AWAITS
special_powers.description: Smoke Cloud as FREE // FREE: Move but only through squares with her smoke cloud markers. After resolutions, remove each of these markers she moved through.

special_powers.name: POWERED BY VENGEANCE
special_powers.description: Blades/Claws/Fangs. Modify attack +2 when targeting only lower point characters.

special_powers.name: YOUR PAST BETRAYS YOU
special_powers.description: Perplex, but only to target opposing characters.

special_powers.name: CONTINUITY
special_powers.description: When Batgirl is KO'd, opposing characters modify attack +1 for the rest of the game.

special_powers.name: SEEMS THE CLUES I FOUND ARE PAYING OFF
special_powers.description: Perplex

special_powers.name: SHE'S EVERYWHERE!
special_powers.description: FREE: Halve speed. Move.

special_powers.name: LET'S SEE WHAT BATGIRL CAN DO
special_powers.description: Outwit. When Batgirl uses it, after resolutions she can use Charge at no cost, but can only attack the character she targeted with Outwit.

special_powers.name: LOOKS LIKE JAIL TIME FOR YOU BOZOS
special_powers.description: FREE: Make a close attack targeting each opposing character within range and line of fire, regardless of adjacency. Instead of normal damage, hit targets are given an action token.

special_powers.name: CONTINUITY
special_powers.description: When Batman, Caped Crusader is KO'd, opposing characters modify defense +2 for the rest of the game.

special_powers.name: SMOKE PELLETS
special_powers.description: Smoke Cloud as FREE

special_powers.name: HE'S EVERYWHERE!
special_powers.description: FREE: Halve speed. Move.

special_powers.name: UNBEATABLE
special_powers.description: FREE: Heal Batman 1 click for each action token he has.

special_powers.name: I'M THE BATMAN
special_powers.description: FREE: Make a close attack targeting each opposing character within range and line of fire, regardless of adjacency. Instead of normal damage, hit targets are given an action token.

special_powers.name: BATMAN'S KNOWLEDGE DOWNLOADED INTO A ROBOT BODY
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose a character named Batman on your sideline and turn that character to a starting click of 75 points or less. FREE: Choose a standard power displayed on that click, H.A.R.D.A.C. Batman can use the chosen power until your next turn

special_powers.name: I'VE TAKEN A LIFE
special_powers.description: STOP. Invulnerability. When this click is revealed, for the rest of the game, H.A.R.D.A.C. Batman can't be healed.

special_powers.name: I KNOW ALL OF YOUR MOVES
special_powers.description: Shape Change. Probability Control, but only to target a character named Batman or H.A.R.D.A.C. Batman.

special_powers.name: GIVER OF THE CHRISTMAS PRESENT
special_powers.description: The Joker may start the game with the [BTAS] #s003 Christmas Present equipped.

special_powers.name: JINGLE BELLS, BATMAN SMELLS, ROBIN LAID AN EGG...
special_powers.description: Charge, Plasticity, Sidestep.

special_powers.name: BATMOBILE LOST A WHEEL, AND JOKER GOT AWAY
special_powers.description: Outwit, Perplex. When the Joker uses either, his minimum range value is 9.

special_powers.name: I HAVE NO MUSCLE, YET I RULE TWO HEMISPHERES. WHAT AM I?
special_powers.description: During force construction, if you have a character named The Riddler on your force, Robot Minotaur may be added to your force for 50 points and does not count for or against a themed team.

special_powers.name: SOLVING THE RIDDLE OF THE MINOTAUR
special_powers.description: When an opposing character targets Robot Minotaur with Outwit or Perplex, roll a d6. [1-3]: After resolutions, give Robot Minotaur an action token. If you have a character named The Riddler on your force, the action token is only given on a result of [1-2].

special_powers.name: RENUYU
special_powers.description: Shape Change. When Clayface uses it and succeeds, give him a Renuyu token. Whenever Clayface rolls a single d6 for a power he's using, after rolling you may remove any number of Renuyu tokens to increase the result +1 for each token removed.

special_powers.name: UNCONTROLLED SHIFTING
special_powers.description: Battle Fury. Giant Reach: X where X is the number of Renuyu tokens Clayface has.

special_powers.name: STRIKE FROM ABOVE
special_powers.description: Hypersonic Speed, Stealth. When Man-Bat uses Hypersonic Speed, if the attack total is 2 or higher than the target's defense value, after resolutions you may place a hit character of the same size or smaller in any square Man-Bat moved through after the attack. If the character is placed in a square of lower elevation than the square it was in, deal that character 2 damage.

special_powers.name: ECHOLOCATION
special_powers.description: Super Senses, Toughness. When Man-Bat uses Super Senses, increase his result by the number of action tokens on the attacker.

special_powers.name: MORE THAN JUST A DUMMY
special_powers.description: The Ventriloquist may start the game with the [BTAS] #s004 Scarface equipped. If the Ventriloquist has [BTAS] #s004 Scarface equipped, he can use 'Leadership, Mastermind. When the Ventriloquist uses Leadership and succeeds, instead of removing action token(s), you may generate a [BTAS] #005 Suited Henchman. (When placing the Suited Henchman, roll for its trait to determine its starting click.)'

special_powers.name: YOU WOULD SWEAR IT WAS TWO SEPARATE PEOPLE
special_powers.description: When the Ventriloquist would take damage from an attack, you may choose to unequip a [BTAS] #s004 Scarface to take a maximum of 1 damage instead.

special_powers.name: TOUGH SILVER SCREEN IDOL
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, you may choose a character on your force named Batman or Bruce Wayne. If you do, The Grey Ghost and the chosen characters attack rolls of (3, 3), (4, 4), (5, 5), (6, 6) are all critical hits.

special_powers.name: HEY! WE DON'T NEED MORE EXTRAS IN THIS SCENE!
special_powers.description: While The Grey Ghost is on the map, characters can't generate bystanders if a bystander of that name is already on the map. If a character generates multiple same bystanders at once, they can generate the first one.

special_powers.name: DISCOVER YOUR FIENDISH PLOT - AND FOIL IT
special_powers.description: Outwit, Perplex.

special_powers.name: ETERNAL LOVE AND ETERNALLY CURSED
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may turn Hawkman & Hawkgirl's dial to the same click number of a different color. // When Hawkman & Hawkgirl would be KO'd, you may instead turn them to click #1 of a different color and they can't use this trait for the rest of the game. Protected: Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: JUSTICE LEAGUE UNLIMITED
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6. [6]: Remove an action token from another friendly character with the Justice League keyword that's 100 points or less.

special_powers.name: BRINGS AERIAL MOBILITY TO THE TEAM
special_powers.description: Sidestep, but may move up to 3 squares instead. Modify attack +1 when targeting only characters without [Wing Symbol].

special_powers.name: JUSTICE LEAGUE UNLIMITED
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6. [6]: Remove an action token from another friendly character with the Justice League keyword that's 100 points or less.

special_powers.name: MAGIC POWERS AND SHOWMANSHIP
special_powers.description: Penetrating/Psychic Blast, Telekinesis. FREE: Generate a Bat bystander (MAX 2).

special_powers.name: WHAT'S WITH THE BACKWARDS SPEAK?
special_powers.description: Perplex, Probability Control.

special_powers.name: ADORABLE... AND HELPFUL
special_powers.description: Enhancement, Shape Change.

special_powers.name: MUTAGENIC EXPERIMENT
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose one: Stealth, Shape Change, [Tiny symbol], -or- Giant Reach: 2. Inque can use the chosen power or ability until your next turn.

special_powers.name: LIQUID POLYMORPH
special_powers.description: Hypersonic Speed, Sidestep. If Inque occupies water terrain, she modifies her combat values -1 and she can't use Hypersonic Speed or Sidestep.

special_powers.name: SHADOWMELD
special_powers.description: Super Senses, Energy Shield/Deflection.

special_powers.name: TROUBALERT: COME IN, BATMAN!
special_powers.description: SIDELINE ACTIVE - Friendly characters have "FREE: If this character critical missed this turn or made the third attack this turn to miss all opposing targets, place a character from your Sideline that can use a TroubAlert trait adjacent on its blue starting line." // At the beginning of your turn, if Batman started the game due to the TroubAlert trait, roll a d6. 4-6: Deal Batman 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: STOPPING TO LECTURE ABOUT SCIENCE, MY OCCASIONAL WEAKNESS
special_powers.description: Characters that can use Perplex modify attack +2 when attacking only Batman. Characters that can use Perplex modify defense +2 when Batman attacks them.

special_powers.name: MY UTILITY BELT HAS EVERYTHING, BUT SMOKE IS USUAL BEST
special_powers.description: Smoke Cloud. When Batman uses it, if he doesn't already have one give him a Worse Idea token.// FREE: Remove a Worse Idea token and choose a standard attack power. Batman can use the chosen power until your next turn.

special_powers.name: TROUBALERT: COME IN, ROBIN!
special_powers.description: SIDELINE ACTIVE - Friendly characters have "FREE: If this character critical missed this turn or made the third attack this turn to miss all opposing targets, place a character from your Sideline that can use a TroubAlert trait adjacent on its blue starting line." // At the beginning of your turn, if Robin started the game due to the TroubAlert trait, roll a d6. 4-6: Deal Robin 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: HELP, I'VE BEEN CAPTURED... AGAIN!
special_powers.description: When Robin is KO'd, you may choose an opposing character of 30 points or more. If you do, for the rest of the game, when the chosen character is KO'd, generate a [BTAS] #064 Robin on his blue starting line into that character's square.

special_powers.name: BEING CAPTURED, MY OCCASIONAL WEAKNESS!
special_powers.description: Characters that can use Plasticity modify attack +2 when attacking only Robin. Characters that can use Plasticity modify defense +2 when Robin attacks them.

special_powers.name: TROUBALERT: COME IN, AQUAMAN!
special_powers.description: SIDELINE ACTIVE - Friendly characters have "FREE: If this character critical missed this turn or made the third attack this turn to miss all opposing targets, place a character from your Sideline that can use a TroubAlert trait adjacent on its blue starting line." // At the beginning of your turn, if Aquaman started the game due to the TroubAlert trait, roll a d6. 4-6: Deal Aquaman 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: HAVING TO DO STUFF ON LAND, MY OCCASIONAL WEAKNESS
special_powers.description: Characters that aren't occupying water terrain modify attack +2 when attacking only Aquaman. Characters that aren't occupying water terrain modify defense +2 when Aquaman attacks them.

special_powers.name: I'LL USE MY UNDERSEA TELEPATHY
special_powers.description: POWER: Generate three Average Fish bystanders.

special_powers.name: AQUAMAN, GO DEAL WITH THE WATERY CRISIS OVER THERE
special_powers.description: FREE: Generate up to 6 water terrain markers in distinct squares within 4 squares, each adjacent to at least on other, and at least one marker must be adjacent to Aquaman. At the beginning of your next turn, remove the water terrain markers. // FREE: Generate an Average Fish bystander in a square with a water terrain marker placed by Aquaman.
At the end of your turn, KO this character if it's not occupying water terrain.

special_powers.name: TROUBALERT: COME IN, SUPERMAN!
special_powers.description: SIDELINE ACTIVE - Friendly characters have "FREE: If this character critical missed this turn or made the third attack this turn to miss all opposing targets, place a character from your Sideline that can use a TroubAlert trait adjacent on its blue starting line." // At the beginning of your turn, if Superman started the game due to the TroubAlert trait, roll a d6. 4-6: Deal Superman 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: FORCE FIELDS, MY OCCASIONAL WEAKNESS!
special_powers.description: Characters that can use Energy Shield/Deflection modify attack +2 when attacking only Superman. Characters that can use Energy Shield/Deflection modify defense +2 when Superman attacks them.

special_powers.name: SPINNING AROUND THEM SUPER FAST USUALLY WORKS
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose an opposing character within 5 squares that has no other characters within 1 square of it. Destroy all pieces of blocking terrain adjacent to that character and roll a d6. 4-6: Give that character an action token.

special_powers.name: TROUBALERT: COME IN, WONDER WOMAN!
special_powers.description: SIDELINE ACTIVE - Friendly characters have "FREE: If this character critical missed this turn or made the third attack this turn to miss all opposing targets, place a character from your Sideline that can use a TroubAlert trait adjacent on its blue starting line." // At the beginning of your turn, if Wonder Woman started the game due to the TroubAlert trait, roll a d6. 4-6: Deal Wonder Woman 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: TIED UP BY MY OWN MAGIC LASSO, MY OCCASIONAL WEAKNESS!
special_powers.description: Characters that can use Telekinesis modify attack +2 when targeting only Wonder Woman. Characters that can use Telekinesis modify defense +2 when Wonder Woman attacks them.

special_powers.name: GIVING THE SUPER FRIENDS A RIDE IN THE INVISIBLE JET... EVEN AQUAMAN
special_powers.description: Hypersonic Speed, [Wing Symbol], Passengers: 2. Wonder Woman may carry one same size character with [Dolphin Symbol] in addition to any other carried characters.

special_powers.name: LASSO OF TRUTH TO CAPTURE THEM ALL AT ONCE
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose an opposing character within 5 squares and line of fire that has a character adjacent to it. Roll a d6 for that character and each character adjacent to it. [4-6]: give the character you rolled for an action token.

special_powers.name: TROUBALERT: COME IN, FLASH!
special_powers.description: SIDELINE ACTIVE - Friendly characters have "FREE: If this character critical missed this turn or made the third attack this turn to miss all opposing targets, place a character from your Sideline that can use a TroubAlert trait adjacent on its blue starting line" // At the beginning of your turn, if The Flash started the game due to the TroubAlert trait, roll a d6. 4-6: Deal The Flash 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: WAITING FOR UNSPEEDY PEOPLE, MY OCCASIONAL WEAKNESS!
special_powers.description: Characters that can use Sidestep modify attack +2 when attacking only The Flash. Characters that can use Sidestep modify defense +2 when The Flash attacks them.

special_powers.name: SOMETIMES I CAN FLY
special_powers.description: Wing Symbol, Passenger: 0. Hypersonic Speed

special_powers.name: EXCITE HIGH-SPEED MOLECULAR ACTION
special_powers.description: Telekinesis. Pulse Wave with a range value of 4.

special_powers.name: TROUBALERT: COME IN, GREEN LANTERN!
special_powers.description: SIDELINE ACTIVE - Friendly characters have "FREE: If this character critical missed this turn or made the third attack this turn to miss all opposing targets, place a character from your Sideline that can use a TroubAlert trait adjacent on its blue starting line." // At the beginning of your turn, if Green Lantern started the game due to the TroubAlert trait, roll a d6. 4-6: Deal Batman 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: THE COLOR YELLOW, MY OCCASIONAL WEAKNESS!
special_powers.description: Characters displaying a yellow power (on their combat dial) modify attack +2 when attacking only Green Lantern. Characters displaying a yellow power (on their combat dial) modify defense +2 when Green Lantern attacks them.

special_powers.name: KYRO, MY VENUSIAN SIDEKICK
special_powers.description: POWER: Once per game, generate a Kyro bystander. For the rest of the game, Green Lantern may carry that character in addition to any other carried characters.

special_powers.name: TROUBALERT: COME IN, APACHE CHIEF!
special_powers.description: SIDELINE ACTIVE - Friendly characters have "FREE: If this character critical missed this turn or made the third attack this turn to miss all opposing targets, place a character from your Sideline that can use a TroubAlert trait adjacent on its blue starting line." // At the beginning of your turn, if Apache Chief started the game due to the TroubAlert trait, roll a d6. 4-6: Deal Apache Chief 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: PEOPLE WHO ARE TOO SMALL, MY OCCASIONAL WEAKNESS!
special_powers.description: Characters with [Tiny Symbol] modify their attack +2 when targeting only Apache Chief. Characters with [Tiny Symbol] modify defense +2 when Apache Chief attacks them.

special_powers.name: INUK CHUK!
special_powers.description: FREE: If Apache Chief has [Starburst symbol], he gains [Giant Symbol]. If he has [Giant Symbol], he gains [Colossal Symbol]. If he has [Colossal Symbol], give him a Big Man token. //For each Big Man token, increase his Giant Reach by +1 and modify attack +1. When Apache Chief attacks a character with [Giant Symbol] or [Colossal Symbol], modify his damage +1 for each Big Man token. Apache Chief's size can't be changed by other effects.

special_powers.name: TROUBALERT: COME IN, THE ATOM!
special_powers.description: SIDELINE ACTIVE - Friendly characters have "FREE: If this character critical missed this turn or made the third attack this turn to miss all opposing targets, place a character from your Sideline that can use a TroubAlert trait adjacent on its blue starting line." // At the beginning of your turn, if The Atom started the game due to the TroubAlert trait, roll a d6. 4-6: Deal The Atom 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: PEOPLE WHO ARE TOO BIG, MY OCCASIONAL WEAKNESS!
special_powers.description: Characters with [Giant Symbol] or [Colossal Symbol] modify attack +2 when attacking only the Atom.  Characters with [Giant Symbol] or [Colossal Symbol] modify defense +2 when the Atom attacks them.

special_powers.name: GOTTA RUN, KEEP FIGHTING, GEORGE!
special_powers.description: Super Senses, [Tiny Symbol].

special_powers.name: ON THE SHOULDER OF GIANTS
special_powers.description: Leadership, Outwit, Probability Control.

special_powers.name: TROUBALERT: COME IN, FIRESTORM!
special_powers.description: SIDELINE ACTIVE - Friendly characters have "FREE: If this character critical missed this turn or made the third attack this turn to miss all opposing targets, place a character from your Sideline that can use a TroubAlert trait adjacent on its blue starting line." // At the beginning of your turn, if Firestorm started the game due to the TroubAlert trait, roll a d6. 4-6: Deal Firestorm 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: PROFESSOR STEIN LECTURING ME DURING A BATTLE, MY OCCASIONAL WEAKNESS!
special_powers.description: Characters that can use Outwit modify attack +2 when attacking only Firestorm. Characters that can use Outwit modify defense +2 when Firestorm attacks them.

special_powers.name: MOLECULAR REALIGNMENT
special_powers.description: Perplex. When Firestorm uses it, he can modify a value except damage +2 or -2.

special_powers.name: TROUBALERT: COME IN, HAWKGIRL!
special_powers.description: SIDELINE ACTIVE - Friendly characters have "FREE: If this character critical missed this turn or made the third attack this turn to miss all opposing targets, place a character from your Sideline that can use a TroubAlert trait adjacent on its blue starting line." // At the beginning of your turn, if Hawkgirl started the game due to the TroubAlert trait, roll a d6. 4-6: Deal Hawkgirl 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: NOT GETTING SCREEN TIME, MY OCCASIONAL WEAKNESS!
special_powers.description: Unless Hawkgirl's attack is the first during your turn, characters modify defense +2 when she attacks them. Characters modify attack +2 when attacking Hawkgirl if it is the first attack of their turn.

special_powers.name: CONVINCE EARTH BIRDS TO HELP US
special_powers.description: POWER: Generate an Average Bird bystander. If no friendly characters are within 4 squares, generate two instead.

special_powers.name: TROUBALERT: COME IN, HAWKMAN!
special_powers.description: SIDELINE ACTIVE - Friendly characters have "FREE: If this character critical missed this turn or made the third attack this turn to miss all opposing targets, place a character from your Sideline that can use a TroubAlert trait adjacent on its blue starting line." // At the beginning of your turn, if Hawkman started the game due to the TroubAlert trait, roll a d6. 4-6: Deal Hawkman 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: PEOPLE WHO DON'T FLY, MY OCCASIONAL WEAKNESS
special_powers.description: Characters without [Wing Symbol] modify attack +2 when attacking only Hawkman. Characters without [Wing Symbol] modify defense +2 when Hawkman attacks them.

special_powers.name: CONTAGIOUS LAUGHTER VIA PUN AT THE END OF THE EPISODE
special_powers.description: POWER: Roll a d6 for each adjacent character. [4-6]: Give that character an action token.

special_powers.name: WATCH-PENGUINS STAY BEHIND
special_powers.description: When the Penguin is given a MOVE action, after resolutions, you may generate an Emperor Penguin bystander [MAX 2] in the square he began movement in.

special_powers.name: I'M A LEGITIMATE BUSINESSMAN!
special_powers.description: When The Penguin makes an attack with a single target, if no opposing characters except the target have line of fire to The Penguin, after resolutions remove an action token from The Penguin.

special_powers.name: GRAPPLING HOOK
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose a square within 3 squares and line of fire that's on a different elevation than currently occupied. Place Batman in that square. After resolutions, Batman may make a close attack.

special_powers.name: SWINGLINE
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose a square within 3 squares and line of fire that's on a different elevation than currently occupied. Place Robin in that square. After resolutions, Robin may make a close attack.

special_powers.name: WHAT'S IT GOING TO BE, BATS?... CATCH ME OR SAVE GOTHAM?
special_powers.description: The Joker takes a maximum of 2 damage from an opponent's attack. When The Joker takes damage from an opponent's attack, after resolutions generate a standard light object named The Joker Bomb within 4 squares. At the beginning of your turn, heal The Joker 1 click if there are one or more (unheld) The Joker Bomb object(s) on the map. He can't be healed any other way. Protected: Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: YOU'LL NEVER SEE THIS ONE COMING
special_powers.description: When The Joker attacks, if his attack roll is doubles, modify damage +3.

special_powers.name: GROW AND SPREAD
special_powers.description: Smoke Cloud. Poison Ivy modifies her defense +1 for each 2 distinct squares of hindering terrain adjacent to her.

special_powers.name: INSTANTANEOUS GERMINATION
special_powers.description: FREE: Generate a Biting Vine bystander (MAX 3) into a square of hundering terrain within 10 squares. // FREE: Remove a Biting Vine bystander from the map.
Biting Vine has Immobile. If Biting Vine does not occupy hindering terrain, KO it.
Giant Reach: 2

special_powers.name: I'M AT MY BEST IN THE SHADOWS
special_powers.description: Sidestep, Stealth.

special_powers.name: BULLWHIP
special_powers.description: Giant Reach: 2

special_powers.name: AIN'T WE THE GREATEST?
special_powers.description: Perplex. When Harley Quinn uses it, if she does not choose damage and targets a friendly character named Poison Ivy, Catwoman or The Joker, modify the chosen value by +2 instead.

special_powers.name: LIKES TO PLAY PRANKS
special_powers.description: Probability Control, but only during opponent's turns.

special_powers.name: STENCH AS BAD AS HIS BITE!
special_powers.description: Poison. When Lou uses it, you may give him an action token. If you do, he deals penetrating damage when using Poison this turn.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: RANGE: [Improved Targeting: Elevated, Hindering, Characters], modify damage -1. Make a range attack targeting a single character within 4 squares and line of fire and roll a D6. 1-3: Immediately after resolutions, KO Batarang.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: FREE: This turn, this character can use Battle Fury and modifies its combat values except range +1. At the end of your turn, roll a d6. 1-3: Deal this character 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: FREE: Roll a d6. 1: (You're No Fun, Batman) Christmas Present is KO'd. 2-5: (Pie in the Face) This turn, this character can use Incapacitate with a range value of 3 as FREE. 6: (Drop the Family... Off) Choose an opposing character within 6 squares and line of fire. That character can't be given actions except MOVE actions during it's next turn.

special_powers.name: EFFECT
special_powers.description: Energy Explosion, Ranged Combat Expert. Minimum range value 4.

special_powers.name: Heist
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, generate a special light object with Indestructible named "Cat's Eye Diamonds" in the orange square. It can't be used in object attacks. While it's held, the holder has "FREE: If this character occupies a starting area, KO this object and modify either speed or attack +1 this game. If the character given this action is named Catwoman, modify the chosen value +2 instead." When it's KO'd in this way, generate this object again in the orange square.

special_powers.name: Consolation
special_powers.description: Friendly characters that can use Stealth can use Super Senses when occupying hindering terrain, but only succeed on a 6.

special_powers.name: Shipping Crates
special_powers.description: Characters occupying or adjacent to an orange square have "FREE: Roll a d6. (3-4): Generate a standard light object. (5-6): Generate a standard light or heavy object." (Place the object adjacent to that character.)

special_powers.name: Consolation
special_powers.description: When placing objects at the beginning of the game, you may place 3 additional standard objects.

special_powers.name: Welcome to My Humble Abode
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose a friendly character. That character has "FREE: Roll a D6. You may have this Location make a range attack with 4 range 10 attack 1 damage from the orange square matching the result. Damage dealt by this attack is penetrating. If the character given this action is named The Joker, instead roll 2d6 and choose either d6 as the result." (This attack can't target friendly characters.)

special_powers.name: Consolation
special_powers.description: Friendly characters named the Joker modify attack +1.

special_powers.name: My Babies Need Their Space
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, generate either a Bud or Lou bystander in your starting area. If your starting force has a character named Harley Quinn, generate both instead.

special_powers.name: Consolation
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, if your starting force has a character named Harley Quinn, generate either a Bud or Lou bystander in your starting area

special_powers.name: Rubble
special_powers.description: Characters occupying or adjacent to an orange square have 'FREE: Roll a d6. 3-4 Generate a standard light object. 5-6 Generate a standard light or heavy object.' (Place the object adjacent to that character.)

special_powers.name: Consolation
special_powers.description: When placing objects at the beginning of the game, you may generate and place 3 additional standard objects.

special_powers.name: Iceberg Lounge
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, generate two Iceberge Lounge bystanders in distinct squares of water terrain closer to your starting area than any other starting area. If your starting force has a character named The Penguin, you may generate up to four instead.

special_powers.name: Consolation
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, generate an Emporer Penguin bystander in your starting area or a sqaure of water terrain closer to your starting area than any other starting area.

special_powers.name: Conservatory
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose a friendly character. That character has "POWER: This Location makes a close attack with 10 attack targeting an (opposing) character occupying hindering terrain. Instead of normal damage, a hit character is given an action token. If the character given this action is named Poison Ivy, the attack may target an (opposing) character adjacent to hindering terrain."

special_powers.name: Consolation
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, place 6 hindering terrain markers on the map outside of starting areas. (They stay indefinitely.)
